    <limit effort="1000" lower="0.00000" upper="0.25000" velocity="100.0"/>
    <origin rpy="-0.0 1.5708 0.0" xyz="-0.32 0.0 -0.2"/>
    <parent link="Seg4_link"/>
    <child link="Finger1_link"/>
    <axis xyz="0.00000 0.00000 1.00000"/>
  </joint>
  <link name="Finger1_link">
    <collision name="Finger1_collision">
      <origin rpy="-0.00000 1.57080 0.00000" xyz="0.00000 0.00000 -0.00000"/>
      <geometry>
        <mesh filename="file:///home/adrian/Escritorio/modelado/modelado-ws/install/roverto_description/share/roverto_description/dae/Cubo.014.dae" scale="0.02500 0.35000 0.17500"/>
      </geometry>
    </collision>
    <inertial>
      <inertia ixx="0.05104" ixy="0.00000" ixz="0.00000" iyy="0.01042" iyz="0.00000" izz="0.04104"/>
      <origin rpy="0.00000 0.00000 0.00000" xyz="-0.00000 0.00000 -0.00000"/>
      <mass value="1.00000"/>
    </inertial>
    <visual name="Finger1">
      <origin rpy="-0.00000 1.57080 0.00000" xyz="0.00000 0.00000 -0.00000"/>
      <geometry>
        <mesh filename="file:///home/adrian/Escritorio/modelado/modelado-ws/install/roverto_description/share/roverto_description/dae/Cubo.014.dae" scale="0.02500 0.35000 0.17500"/>
      </geometry>
    </visual>
  </link>
  <joint name="Finger2_joint" type="prismatic">
    <limit effort="1000" lower="0.00000" upper="0.25000" velocity="100.0"/>
    <origin rpy="0.0 -1.5708 0.0" xyz="0.32 0.0 -0.2"/>
    <parent link="Seg4_link"/>
    <child link="Finger2_link"/>
    <axis xyz="0.00000 0.00000 1.00000"/>
  </joint>
  <link name="Finger2_link">
    <collision name="Finger2_collision">
      <origin rpy="-0.00000 1.57080 0.00000" xyz="0.00000 0.00000 -0.00000"/>
      <geometry>
        <mesh filename="file:///home/adrian/Escritorio/modelado/modelado-ws/install/roverto_description/share/roverto_description/dae/Cubo.014.dae" scale="0.02500 0.35000 0.17500"/>
      </geometry>
    </collision>
    <inertial>
      <inertia ixx="0.05104" ixy="0.00000" ixz="0.00000" iyy="0.01042" iyz="0.00000" izz="0.04104"/>
      <origin rpy="0.00000 0.00000 0.00000" xyz="-0.00000 0.00000 -0.00000"/>
      <mass value="1.00000"/>
    </inertial>
    <visual name="Finger2">
      <origin rpy="-0.00000 1.57080 0.00000" xyz="0.00000 0.00000 -0.00000"/>
      <geometry>

      </geometry>
    </visual>
  </link>
  <!-- Joints -->
  <joint name="base_camera_joint" type="fixed">
    <origin rpy="0.00000 0.00000 0.00000" xyz="0.0 -1.8 0.2"/>
    <parent link="base_link"/>
    <child link="base_camera_link"/>
  </joint>
  <joint name="base_camera_frame_joint" type="fixed">
    <origin rpy="0.00000 0.00000 0.00000" xyz="-0.0 -0.0 0.0"/>
    <parent link="base_camera_link"/>
    <child link="base_camera_frame"/>
  </joint>
  <joint name="base_camera_optical_frame_joint" type="fixed">
    <origin rpy="1.57 3.14 0.0" xyz="-0.0 -0.0 0.0"/>
    <parent link="base_camera_frame"/>
    <child link="base_camera_optical_frame"/>
  </joint>
  <!-- Links -->
  <link name="base_camera_link">
    <visual name="base_brazo">
      <origin rpy="0.00000 0.00000 0.00000" xyz="0.0 0.0 -0.0"/>
      <geometry>
        <box size="0.2 0.1 0.1"/>
      </geometry>
    </visual>
  </link>
  <link name="base_camera_frame"/>
  <link name="base_camera_optical_frame"/>
  <gazebo reference="base_camera_frame">
    <sensor name="base_sensor" type="camera">
      <visualize>true</visualize>
      <update_rate>30</update_rate>
      <topic>/base/image</topic>
      <camera>
        <horizontal_fov>1.3962634015954636</horizontal_fov>
        <image>
          <width>1280</width>
          <height>720</height>
          <format>R8G8B8</format>
        </image>
        <clip>
          <near>0.10</near>
          <far>15.0</far>
        </clip>
        <noise>
          <type>gaussian</type>
          <mean>0.0</mean>
          <stddev>0.007</stddev>
        </noise>
        <optical_frame_id>base_camera_frame</optical_frame_id>
      </camera>
    </sensor>
  </gazebo>
  <!-- Joints -->
  <joint name="gripper_camera_joint" type="fixed">
    <origin rpy="0.00000 0.00000 0.00000" xyz="0.0 0.0 0.0"/>
    <parent link="Seg4_link"/>
    <child link="gripper_camera_link"/>
  </joint>
  <joint name="gripper_camera_frame_joint" type="fixed">
    <origin rpy="0.00000 0.00000 0.00000" xyz="-0.0 -0.0 0.0"/>
    <parent link="gripper_camera_link"/>
    <child link="gripper_camera_frame"/>
  </joint>

    <origin rpy="0.0 3.14 0.0" xyz="-0.0 -0.0 0.0"/>
    <parent link="gripper_camera_frame"/>
    <child link="gripper_camera_optical_frame"/>
  </joint>
  <!-- Links -->
  <link name="gripper_camera_link">
    <visual name="base_brazo">
      <origin rpy="0.00000 0.00000 0.00000" xyz="0.0 0.0 -0.0"/>
      <geometry>
        <box size="0.2 0.1 0.1"/>
      </geometry>
    </visual>
  </link>
  <link name="gripper_camera_frame"/>
  <link name="gripper_camera_optical_frame"/>
  <gazebo reference="gripper_camera_frame">
    <sensor name="gripper_sensor" type="camera">
      <visualize>true</visualize>
      <update_rate>30</update_rate>
      <topic>/gripper/image</topic>
      <camera>
        <horizontal_fov>1.3962634015954636</horizontal_fov>
        <image>
          <width>1280</width>
          <height>720</height>
          <format>R8G8B8</format>
        </image>
        <clip>
          <near>0.10</near>
          <far>15.0</far>
        </clip>
        <noise>
          <type>gaussian</type>
          <mean>0.0</mean>
          <stddev>0.007</stddev>
        </noise>
        <optical_frame_id>gripper_camera_frame</optical_frame_id>
      </camera>
    </sensor>
  </gazebo>
  <!-- Joints -->
  <joint name="imu_joint" type="fixed">
    <origin rpy="0.00000 0.00000 0.00000" xyz="0.0 0.0 0.0"/>
    <parent link="base_link"/>
    <child link="imu_link"/>
  </joint>
  <!-- Link -->
  <link name="imu_link"/>
  <gazebo reference="imu_link">
    <sensor name="imu_sensor" type="imu">
      <always_on>1</always_on>
      <update_rate>30</update_rate>
      <topic>imu/data</topic>
    </sensor>
  </gazebo>
  <gazebo>
    <plugin filename="libgz_ros2_control-system.so" name="gz_ros2_control::GazeboSimROS2ControlPlugin">
      <parameters>/home/adrian/Escritorio/modelado/modelado-ws/install/roverto_description/share/roverto_description/config/rover_controllers.yaml</parameters>
    </plugin>
  </gazebo>
  <ros2_control name="rover_interface" type="system">
    <hardware>
      <plugin>gz_ros2_control/GazeboSimSystem</plugin>
    </hardware>
    <joint name="right_front_wheel_joint">
      <command_interface name="velocity">
        <param name="min">-10</param>
        <param name="max">10</param>
      </command_interface>
      <state_interface name="position"/>
      <state_interface name="velocity"/>
      <state_interface name="effort"/>
    </joint>
    <joint name="right_mid_wheel_joint">
      <command_interface name="velocity">
        <param name="min">-10</param>
        <param name="max">10</param>
      </command_interface>
      <state_interface name="position"/>
      <state_interface name="velocity"/>
      <state_interface name="effort"/>
    </joint>
    <joint name="right_back_wheel_joint">
      <command_interface name="velocity">
        <param name="min">-10</param>
        <param name="max">10</param>
      </command_interface>
      <state_interface name="position"/>
      <state_interface name="velocity"/>
      <state_interface name="effort"/>
    </joint>
    <joint name="left_front_back_wheel_joint">
      <command_interface name="velocity">
        <param name="min">-10</param>
        <param name="max">10</param>
      </command_interface>
      <state_interface name="position"/>
      <state_interface name="velocity"/>
      <state_interface name="effort"/>
    </joint>
    <joint name="left_mid_wheel_joint">
      <command_interface name="velocity">
        <param name="min">-10</param>
        <param name="max">10</param>
      </command_interface>
      <state_interface name="position"/>
      <state_interface name="velocity"/>
      <state_interface name="effort"/>
    </joint>
    <joint name="left_back_wheel_joint">
      <command_interface name="velocity">
        <param name="min">-10</param>
        <param name="max">10</param>
      </command_interface>
      <state_interface name="position"/>
      <state_interface name="velocity"/>
      <state_interface name="effort"/>
    </joint>
  </ros2_control>
</robot>
